\begin{abstract}
We study the effect of correlation on the Bragg reflection in the 3D 
electron gas, the 1D Luttinger liquid, and the 1D Hubbard model in 
an alternating periodic potential at half-filling. In the last 
system, we suggest a Luttinger-liquid-type quasi-metallic state in 
the crossover region from the band insulator to the Mott insulator. 
We explain the appearance of this state in terms of the 
incompatibility of the Bragg reflection with the concept of 
Luttinger liquids. 
\end{abstract
author: Yasutami Takada and Manabu Kido
title: Effect of Electron Correlation on the Bragg Reflection
